name: MedeFile International
overview: MedeFile International, Inc. is the trailblazer in the field of electronic personal health records. Formed in 1998 with the primary goal of empowering individuals to take control of their healthcare through efficient information retrieval and selective information sharing, MedeFile is a healthcare technology and services organization that is revolutionizing healthcare and wellness with an innovative and comprehensive solution to the all important, ever increasing challenge of managing medical information in an overwhelmingly diverse and complex healthcare environment. MedeFile is the future of healthcare. Having your entire personal medical history at your fingertips finally puts you in control of your healthcare and wellness. Our goal is to help you create and maintain an organized format for all of your medical records, keeping you informed and prepared for every medical situation or health eventuality. Leadership. Innovation. Emancipation. Protection. Facilitation. Motivation. The Future of Healthcare!
